channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I give my mother’s ailing next-door neighbor $500 a month. She agreed to sell me her house, although she’ll continue to live there. Is this a good plan?
item.description: “She has a next-door neighbor who is 72 and disabled, and has even more serious problems.”

item.title: Trump backs marijuana legalization in Florida if 'done correctly'
item.description: In a Truth Social post, the former president said he expects a ballot measure to legalize marijuana in Florida to pass.

item.title: Six hostages, including Israeli American Hersh Goldberg-Polin, found dead in Gaza
item.description: The hostages, taken by Hamas during the Oct. 7 attack, were recovered in a tunnel under Rafah, President Joe Biden said.

item.title: Earnings and a potential kidney disease breakthrough
item.description: Good day, 360! Here are our top investing ideas today. And special invitation to trade Jeff’s Pick of the Day with him this morning in the Market Mast...

item.title: ‘He’s 70 and fairly wealthy’: I met the love of my life three years ago. How do I politely ask that he include me in his will?
item.description: “His two sons are against any kind of commitment between us, as their dad has had two failed marriages.”

item.title: Harris says Trump ‘disrespected sacred’ Arlington for ‘political stunt’
item.description: Donald Trump has blamed President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris for the chaotic Afghanistan withdrawal, during which 13 U.S. soldiers wer...

item.title: Apple and Google wallets want to help make the hotel room key card obsolete
item.description: Through use of Apple Wallet and Google Wallet, hotel chains are racing to ditch the plastic room key card.

item.title: ‘I was heartbroken’: My friend set up a $5,000 GoFundMe for veterinary bills after her cat died. I want to donate $200. Is it better to do so anonymously?
item.description: “She tried desperately to save her companion, and the vet did everything they could but it was hopeless.”

item.title: What's stalling China's stock market recovery, according to KraneShares' CIO
item.description: With investors fleeing Chinese stocks over growth concerns, the case for fiscal intervention could be stronger than ever.

item.title: Japan protests second territorial incursion by China in under a week
item.description: An uptick in Chinese military activity near Japan and around Taiwan in recent years has stoked concerns in Tokyo.

item.title: Beer-making beyond planet Earth: How space-age technology could shape the industry
item.description: A new study from the University of Florida explores the effects of a microgravity environment on the beer-production process

item.title: Netflix hit a record above $700 in August. Here's where analysts see the stock headed next
item.description: Wall Street analysts believe Netflix is a promising long-term hold.

item.description: With investors fleeing Chinese stocks over growth concerns, the case for fiscal intervention could be stronger than ever.

item.title: 401(k) millionaires hit a record high — and it seems this ‘slacker’ generation is finally getting its act together
item.description: The trick: Starting early and contributing “consistently”

item.title: Amazon checkout process hits technical snag during Labor Day sale
item.description: Amazon customers posted complaints on social media about not being able to complete purchases ahead of the Labor Day weekend on Friday.

item.title: The 'rent-first' lifestyle is catching on. From cars to clothes and even caskets, here's when it makes sense to buy vs. rent
item.description: Younger adults are showing a preference for the renting lifestyle, studies show. In some cases, it also makes financial sense.
